media:group.media:title: Personal Bankruptcy (and Its Alternatives) Explained
media:group.media:description:
This video is sponsored by Morning Brew - use the following link to sign up for their awesome newsletter: https://morningbrewdaily.com/theplainbagel

Bankruptcy Exemptions (Canada): https://bankruptcy-canada.com/bankruptcy/bankruptcy-exemptions-what-you-keep/
Bankruptcy Exemptions (US): https://www.thebankruptcysite.org/exemptions/federal.html
Exceptions to Discharge (Canada): https://www.ic.gc.ca/eic/site/bsf-osb.nsf/eng/br02677.html
Exceptions to Discharge (US): https://www.law.cornell.edu/uscode/text/11/523

Bankruptcy is something no one hopes to deal with, and yet we're never actually taught how the process works if we ever fall on hard times. We cover the basics (and its alternatives) in today's video

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/ThePlainBagel :)

DISCLAIMER:
This channel is for education purposes only and does not constitute financial advice - Richard is not responsible for investment actions taken by viewers. Please seek out a registered advisor if you require assistance (while Richard is a registered portfolio manager at WDS Investment Management, he does not provide advice through The Plain Bagel, which is not affiliated with his employer).
